mapper.select: select * from student where stu_no = #{stuNo} and password = #{password};
select count(*) as count from student where stu_no = #{stuNo};

select stu.*, ins.institute_name, cla.class_name, cla.grade from student as stu, institute as ins, class as cla where stu.stu_no = #{stuNo} and stu.institute_no = ins.institute_no and ins.institute_no = cla.institute_no and stu.class_no = cla.class_no
mapper.update: update student set verify_status = #{status} where stu_no = #{stuNo};
